welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Reeuwijksebrug, a charming town known for its picturesque canals and serene atmosphere. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for cargo operations, handling both domestic and international shipments.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is the largest terminal at Schiphol Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily European flights and is connected to the main terminal by a covered walkway.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily intercontinental flights and is connected to the main terminal by a covered walkway.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
